attributes.action: Make the minimum sentence of a person carrying a knife with the intent to injure or kill 20 years in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent well known events of teenagers like Rob Knox and recently Ben Kinsella being murdered by individuals carrying a knife with the intent to kill, it is about time tougher and stricter sentencing was passed and should carry at least a 20 year prison sentence.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make the minimum sentence of a person carrying a knife with the intent to injure or kill 20 years in prison."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20707
